itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Cardomax CEO and Former Navy SEAL Sean Matson joins the show to talk about the Virginia gubernatorial election between Terry McAullife and Glenn Youngkin, why so many operators are leaving the military and if it's over the COVID vaccine mandates, and how...
itunes:summary:
Cardomax CEO and Former Navy SEAL Sean Matson joins the show to talk about the Virginia gubernatorial election between Terry McAullife and Glenn Youngkin, why so many operators are leaving the military and if it's over the COVID vaccine mandates, and how he effectively divides his time between work and family.
